description:
Attorney Michael F. Becker founded our Cleveland law office, The Becker Law Firm, L.P.A., in order to protect the rights of victims of negligence living throughout northern Ohio. Today, our law firm has a reputation as one of the region's leading personal injury firms, and Cleveland residents know to turn to us for representation as they pursue personal injury and wrongful death compensation in cases related to:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injuries

We understand that our clients often have legal concerns that go beyond compensation. For this reason, we offer assistance with the creation of special needs trusts, guardianships and conservatorships. We know the challenges that exist because a child has permanent injuries and disabilities, so we work to help parents find peace of mind by knowing that their children's futures are secure.

Whether you require help pursuing the compensation you both need and deserve or you would like to build a plan for the future care of your child, you can put your trust in the attorneys at The Becker Law Firm, L.P.A. If you would like to learn more about how we can help you, you can schedule a free initial consultation at our law office in Cleveland.
